basic_info.description: My name is Dana, and I'm in training to be a software developer. Before I decided to change careers, I was working in retail which, as most people can tell you, isn't the most stable or rewarding job. I decided to go all in on software development when I took a C++ class in college and realized I had a natural talent and a real passion for the subject. So far, I've been using JavaScript the most because it's easy to see the results of your work and it's similar to the original language that I learned and loved, but I plan to specialize into Python. Ideally, I would be able to work in an environment where I get to be creative and make things like applications. I also have previous experience in relatively specific retail fields, such as small business and everyday neglig√©e, which makes me an ideal hire, as I have often had to do self-guided work with little to no input as well as be able to read the moods and needs of customers to switch gears as the situation calls for in different fast paced and sometimes discreet environments.

projects.title: Blackjack Vibes
projects.description: My code 201 final - I worked on this site with a group of amazing people and it is designed to allow the player to run blackjack against the computer and keep track of their progression.

projects.title: Gallery of Horned Beasts
projects.description: A project for my 301 class requiring the ability to use React and Bootstrap to create a searchable database of horned beasts.

projects.title: 301 Final
projects.description: This is where I would put my final if I had one
